urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @BerryBecks27 Hi Rebecca, please DM us here: Twitter Frontier Care DM (https://t.co/RU15h72QCa) so we can look into this for you.
@lstafford625 @9NEWS Hello Lori. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. Can you please send us your full name and 6-digit confirmation code so that we can look into this for you? -Jas

@beingthebhavesh We are always pleased to hear from a satisfied customer and are delighted that your recent experience was enjoyable. Our employees work hard to provide quality service and it is thoughtful of you to let us know their efforts are noticed and appreciated! -Jas
@Mazon2x Hello, I'm sorry for the delayed response. Do you still need help with this? -Jas
@the_coachrhodes Can you please send your 6-digit confirmation code and the full names of the passengers on the reservation so that we can look into this for you? -Barb
@Cgrekin Please reach out to Barclay at 866-839-2435 -Barb

@karinatissnes @LASairport Good afternoon karinatissnes, upon review, you bag has been setup for delivery. You can refer back to your baggage claim for assistance. At this time, we do not have a tracking number to provide you. We sincerely apologize if this causes you any inconvenience.-Brittany

@Jeff41048 Hello there! We are so sorry for the delayed response. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience that you have had with our airlines. Please send us a direct message with the 6-digit confirmation code and the names of the passengers so we can further assist you. -Shean

@moemoco70 Hi,  @moemoco70 , thanks for reaching out! I'm sorry you have had this experience. Please share with us your 6-digit confirmation code along the full passenger's name through DM for further assistance.- Sofia

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

urls.title: Discount Den®
urls.description: With a DISCOUNT DEN® subscription you will have exclusive access to Frontier's LOWEST available fares.

data.text:
Wouldn't it be great to: 

✈️ Be guaranteed the lowest airfare.
🌅 Take a family vacation where your kids can fly for free. 
👍 Have access to exclusive deals.

At Frontier, we offer all of this and more with our Discount Den club! Join today! https://t.co/wNCoACPju9 https://t.co/gPpCLEgvpK

urls.title: Frontier Airlines | Cheap Fares | Friendly Service
urls.description: Fly away with Frontier and enjoy our low fares to great places. Save a bundle when you get the WORKS℠ and earn miles towards your next trip with us!

data.text: Hudson Valley, it's time for vacay! Today we launched nonstop service from @SWFairport  to Atlanta and Raleigh-Durham. We are offering fares as low as $69 on nonstop flights to Raleigh-Durham and $79 on nonstop flights to Atlanta!  https://t.co/585W7cf6HM https://t.co/7aJ0H3U9WT

@fernapaba Hola, @pearljamaniac. Gracias por ponerte en contacto con Frontier airline. Lamentamos tu experiencia. Por favor, envíanos un mensaje privado junto con tu código de confirmación de 6 dígitos y los nombres de los pasajeros de la reserva si todavía necesitas asistencia. -Bryan.
